page.title: 05SWINDERBY METHODIST CHURCH.
page.content: A Church built in 1869 and part of Lincoln South Circuit, the Minister is Rev.E.Greetham. There are 16 members. The{Sunday School} joins the adults at 11am each Sunday and the service starts with organ music,on an electric pipe organ, and a hymn from {"Hymns {and Psalms"}published in 1983. Bible readings from the {Authorised Version 1611, {The New English Bible} 1961 or the{Good News Bible}1966 follow. Usually there are five hymns, prayers, a sermon and a blessing. Money is collected for Church Funds, Ministers salaries and Circuit Funds, and in special boxes for Home and Overseas Missions.The{Preacher}may be a lay man except at a Communion Service. It is Licensed for marriages. The {Womans' Fellowship} meets on Tuesdays at 2.15, the{Shell Group}for 7's to 12's is on Fridays at 6.15.
